sources.title: HerSecret
sources.description: Title: Her Secret Summary: In "Her Secret" (aka "The Girl from Georgia" in the UK in 1934 when shown there)Johnny, the son of a rich-man, is an idling, good-for-nothing loafer, who leads a wild-and-hectic life, ... Directed by: Warren Millais Actors: Sari Maritza, William Collier Jr., Alan Mowbray Production Company: Helen Mitchell Release Date: 19 December 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 In "Her Secret" (aka "The Girl from Georgia" in the UK in 1934 when shown there)Johnny, the son of a rich-man, is an idling, good-for-nothing loafer, who leads a wild-and-hectic life, flunks out of college, and is disinherited and made to leave home by his father, who has given up on his on in despair. Johnny opens a gas-station in Arizona, where "Waffles,", a girl from Georgia, takes him in hand and employs her own methods of reformation with astonishing and fruitful results. More comedy than drama, if the meller-drammer acting is over-looked.
